patterns: i have been calling your phone support for an hour but i am not able to talk to your representative.
now i am not near to the router.
i am out of home now.
i am in my shop but i face internet issue in home.
i face internet issue when i am near to the router.
responses: due to high number of calls on phone support, your call might be on queue.
how far are you from the router?
please go near to the router and update us your issue.
please update us your issue when you are near to the router.
you are not near to your router, how did you know you are facing slow internet connection?
please update your issue when you are near to the router.
